title: Cerebral Perfusion Pressure
desc: Cerebral Perfusion Pressure measures blood flow to the brain.

data.evidence:
CPP = MAP – ICP

MAP, mean arterial pressure. ICP, intracranial pressure.
data.facts: Target CPP in TBI patients is 60–70 mmHg, per 2017 Brain Trauma Foundation evidence-based guidelines.
